comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: I knew I knew her name en.wikipedia.org/wiki/RMS_Adriatic_(1907) the last White Star Class before the Olympics. RMS Adriatic was an ocean liner of the White Star Line. She was the fourth of a quartet of ships measuring over 20,000 tons, dubbed The Big Four. The ship was the only one of the four which was never the world's largest ship; however, she was the fastest of the Big Four. The Adriatic was the first ocean liner to have an indoor swimming pool and a Turkish bath.
